channel.title: Um question about making a server
channel.description:
yea i made my ip n stuff but heres the problem.....idk how to make myself an admin/owner idk how to make npcs (with trade option to sell stuff, and how to make then sell items, how to make npcs have healther, and drop stuff) and idk how to let ppl into my server and what ppl start out with and how to make statues gain xp also idk how to make it so there is other place to go and yea so if someone could help me to make my server
(oh and i was on tutorial and i was on step 5 and idk where t put that gateway code it says in browser but idk what browser to put it in incase that has suttin to do wit my problems?)
please help!

item.source: Um question about making a server

item.title: Um question about making a server
item.dc:creator: @Carson Carson
item.description:
@Carson wrote:

Making a server takes ALOT of time… And it’s harder then you think. So goodluck… Here, i’ll help you.

Go to Char .Java

Find your name, double click it.

Go down to Player Rights 0

Change 0 to 1 for Mod, 2 for Admin, 3 for Owner, and 4 for Hidden Admin, ( No crown, Admin rights. )

Read full topic
